description: This Dart file defines a theme module for a Flutter application, including color constants and a function to build a custom ThemeData with specific styling for various widgets.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: A utility class containing static constants for the color palette used across the theme.

methods.name: buildOceanProfessionalTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a customized ThemeData object with a professional, minimalistic style, used to theme the Flutter app.
